    public class ToolBar
extends com.vaadin.ui.HorizontalLayout
    Container for holding ToolbarEntrys.
    作者:
    Frederik Heremans, Joram Barrez
    另请参阅:

      • addToolbarEntry

        public ToolbarEntry addToolbarEntry(String key,
                                    String title,
                                    ToolbarEntry.ToolbarCommand command)
        Add a new entry to the tool bar.

      • addPopupEntry

        public ToolbarPopupEntry addPopupEntry(String key,
                                       String title)
        Add a new entry, which displays a pop-up-list when clicked. Items of that list can be added on returned ToolbarPopupEntry instance.

      • addButton

        public void addButton(com.vaadin.ui.Button button)
        Add a button to the toolbar. The buttons are rendered on the right of the toolbar.

      • removeAllButtons

        public void removeAllButtons()

      • addAdditionalComponent

        public void addAdditionalComponent(com.vaadin.ui.Component component)

      • removeAllAdditionalComponents

        public void removeAllAdditionalComponents()

      • getCount

        public long getCount(String key)

      • setCount

        public void setCount(String key,
                     Long count)
        Update the count field on the entry with the given key.

      • getEntry

        public ToolbarEntry getEntry(String key)
        Gets the entry for the given key. Returns null when entry is not present for the given key.

      • setActiveEntry

        public void setActiveEntry(String key)
        Set the entry active with the given key. Active entries will have alternative style applied to them.

      • addEntryComponent

        protected void addEntryComponent(ToolbarEntry entry)

      • getCurrentEntryKey

        public String getCurrentEntryKey()
